title: REACT NATIVE FRONT END DEV
description:
You will be joining the tech team and taking ownership of the product features you design and develop.  As a React Native Front End Developer you will be responsible for the following tasks:

- Building new features for our B2C/Marketplace mobile app
- Collaborating with the product team to plan new product features
- Working closely with backend team to effectively deliver new features
- Keeping to deadlines and delivering consistently good work
- Contributing to our positive high-performance team morale
- Contributing to team training sessions by sharing your knowledge and experience
requirements:
Essential Skills & Experience
- Experience working with Redux.
- At least 1 year of real work experience with React Native, must understand basic philosophy of React Native and React component lifecycle.
- Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token is a plus
- Familiarity with code versioning tools especially Git
- Understanding of HTTP protocol, RESTful data structures, and JSON format.
- Experience with push notification 
- Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
- Good product mindset, communication and English skills
- Strong verbal and written communication skills in English.
